co.cask.coopr.store.entity

Class BaseSQLEntityStoreView

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.coopr.store.entity.BaseEntityStoreView
      • co.cask.coopr.store.entity.BaseSQLEntityStoreView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityStoreView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLAdminEntityStoreView, SQLUserEntityStoreView

    public abstract class BaseSQLEntityStoreView
extends BaseEntityStoreView
    Base implementation of BaseEntityStoreView using a sql database as the persistent store.
